decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: P1 Rev R1, P2. P3. P4 Rev R2, P5 Rev R1, P6, P7, P8, P9 Rev R2, Fire Safety Strategy, Planning Statement 
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The external surfaces of the proposed outbuilding hereby approved shall be constructed in materials to match the main dwellinghouse.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The proposed outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for purposes which are incidental to the enjoyment of the host dwelling at No. 16 Westmorland Road, Harrow, HA1 4PN, and shall not be used as separate self contained accommodation. Any other material change of use would require planning permission. 
REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013)

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the west and south elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Conversion of detached garage in rear garden for use as annexe ancillary to dwelling; external alterations
